content.text:
# Draft:1935–36 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

The 1935-36 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 45th season of existence and their 16th season in the Football League Third Division. QPR finished 4th in the league, and were eliminated in the first round of the FA Cup.
League standings
Results
QPR scores given first
Third Division South
